assigngmv,assignthgmv,pergmv,perthgmv,year,month ) select ts.city_name as city_name, ts.storeno as storeno, ts.`name` as store_name, tman.employee_no as employee_no, tman.`name` as employee_name, ( ifnull(areaemp.areagmv,0) - ifnull(areaempth.areathgmv,0) + ifnull(assgin.assigngmv,0) - ifnull(assginth.assignthgmv,0) + ifnull(percap.pergmv,0) - ifnull(percapth.perthgmv,0) ) as pesgmv , (ifnull(sendemp.sendgmv,0) - ifnull(sendempth.sendthgmv,0)) as pes_sendgmv, (ifnull(areaemp.areagmv,0) - ifnull(areaempth.areathgmv,0)) as pes_areagmv, (ifnull(assgin.assigngmv,0) - ifnull(assginth.assignthgmv,0)) as pes_assigngmv, (ifnull(percap.pergmv,0) - ifnull(percapth.perthgmv,0)) as pes_pergmv, ifnull(sendemp.sendgmv,0) as sendgmv, ifnull(sendempth.sendthgmv,0) as sendthgmv, ifnull(areaemp.areagmv,0) as areagmv, ifnull(areaempth.areathgmv,0) as areathgmv, ifnull(assgin.assigngmv,0) as assigngmv, ifnull(assginth.assignthgmv,0) as assignthgmv, ifnull(percap.pergmv,0) as pergmv, ifnull(percapth.perthgmv,0) as perthgmv, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) from t_humanresources tman join t_store ts on (tman.store_id = ts.store_id) left join ( select employee_no, store_id, sum(gmv_price) * 0.5 as sendgmv from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND (tor.loan_label ='0' or tor.loan_label ='3' or tor.loan_label = '5') AND (tor.abnormal_label ='0' AND tor.pubseas_label ='0') AND tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} AND tor.sign_time <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by employee_no ) sendemp on (tman.employee_no = sendemp.employee_no ) left join ( select employee_no, store_id, sum(returned_amount) * 0.5 as sendthgmv from df_mass_order_total tor where tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND areagmv from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND (tor.loan_label ='0' or tor.loan_label info_employee_a_no ) areaemp on (tman.employee_no = areaemp.info_employee_a_no ) left join ( select info_employee_a_no, store_id, sum(returned_amount) * 1 as areathgmv from df_mass_order_total tor where tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND (tor.loan_label ='0' or tor.loan_label ='3' or tor.loan_label = '5') AND (tman.employee_no = areaempth.info_employee_a_no ) left join ( select dopm.employee_no, sum(tor.gmv_price) as assigngmv from df_order_pubseas_monthly dopm join df_mass_order_monthly tor on (dopm.df_order_id = tor.id) where dopm.employee_no is not null AND tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND (tor.loan_label ='0' or tor.loan_label ='3' or tor.loan_label = '5') AND (tor.abnormal_label ='0' AND tor.pubseas_label ='1') AND dopm.df_signed_time >=#{begindate} AND dopm.df_signed_time <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by dopm.employee_no ) assgin on (tman.employee_no = assgin.employee_no) left join ( select dopm.employee_no, sum(tor.returned_amount) as assignthgmv from df_order_pubseas_monthly dopm join df_mass_order_total tor on (dopm.df_order_id = tor.id) where dopm.employee_no is not null AND tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.return_time <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by dopm.employee_no ) assginth on (tman.employee_no = assginth.employee_no) left join ( select aa.store_id,(persum/pernum) as pergmv from ( select ts.platformid,ts.store_id ,count(1) as pernum from t_humanresources thuman ,t_store ts where thuman.store_id = ts.store_id and thuman.zw ='国安侠' and thuman.humanstatus =1 group by ts.platformid ) aa , (select store_id, sum(gmv_price) persum from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND customer_id like 'fakecustomer%' AND tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by store_id ) bb where aa.platformid = bb.store_id ) percap on (tman.store_id = percap.store_id) left join ( select aa.store_id,(persum/pernum) as perthgmv from ( select ts.platformid,ts.store_id ,count(1) as pernum from t_humanresources thuman ,t_store ts where thuman.store_id = ts.store_id and thuman.zw ='国安侠' and thuman.humanstatus =1 group by ts.platformid ) aa , (select store_id, sum(returned_amount) persum from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' AND tor.store_white !='QA' and tor.store_status = 0 AND customer_id like 'fakecustomer%' AND tor.return_time >=#{begindate} and tor.return_time <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by store_id) bb where aa.platformid = bb.store_id ) percapth on (tman.store_id = percapth.store_id) where tman.humanstatus = 1 and zw ='国安侠' order by tman.store_id
